name: The Wizard Ran 6
description:
• Next chapter: February 1st
  • Previous chapter
  • First chapter

The sixth episode in the wizard's adventures! This time, you have a pirate crew and do pirate things. Explore 4 different islands, collect treasures, steal from your enemies, discover Cueball's latest plans.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar/X/Shift: interact
  • Click the island buttons in front of your ship to travel there.
  • R: Restart room ?
  • M: hold to bring out map
  • B: cannonBalldude (when he's ready)
